sourcesContent:
/**
 * Demo data — 50 movies, working TMDB CDN poster URLs (no API key needed).
 * Display as: https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500{posterUrl}
 */

export const DEMO_MOVIES = [

  // ── ACTION ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  { id: 155,    title: 'The Dark Knight',               language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 152, releaseDate: '2008-07-18', posterUrl: '/qJ2tW6WMUDux911r6m7haRef0WH.jpg', description: 'When the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.' },
  { id: 299534, title: 'Avengers: Endgame',             language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 181, releaseDate: '2019-04-26', posterUrl: '/or06FN3Dka5tukK1e9sl16pB3iy.jpg', description: 'After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos\' actions.' },
  { id: 385687, title: 'Fast X',                        language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 141, releaseDate: '2023-05-19', posterUrl: '/fiVW06jE7z9YnO4trhaMEdclSiC.jpg', description: 'Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the son of drug lord Hernan Reyes in their most lethal mission yet.' },
  { id: 447365, title: 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3',language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 150, releaseDate: '2023-05-05', posterUrl: '/r2J02Z2OpNTctfOSN1Ydgii51I3.jpg', description: 'Peter Quill rallies his team on a mission to protect one of their own — a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians.' },
  { id: 603692, title: 'John Wick: Chapter 4',          language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 169, releaseDate: '2023-03-24', posterUrl: '/vZloFAK7NmvMGKE7VkF5UHaz0I.jpg', description: 'John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table, but must first face a powerful new enemy.' },
  { id: 361743, title: 'Top Gun: Maverick',             language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 130, releaseDate: '2022-05-27', posterUrl: '/62HCnUTHOIF3iKBHxuYIdnSqkAz.jpg', description: 'After 30 years, Pete Mitchell is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, training a new generation for a dangerous mission.' },
  { id: 24428,  title: 'The Avengers',                  language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 143, releaseDate: '2012-05-04', posterUrl: '/RYMX2wpPBO7A3UZxGQFuuHPAFWH.jpg', description: 'Earth\'s mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.' },
  { id: 245891, title: 'John Wick',                     language: 'English', genre: 'Action',    durationMins: 101, releaseDate: '2014-10-24', posterUrl: '/fZPSd91yGE9fCcCe6OoQr6E3Bev.jpg', description: 'An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.' },
